ygData.subject: Bow for bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night, we were hunting froogie foragers for the medalions so we can get keys for Sebilis.  Looks like the spectral bow is the forager s common (like every
ygData.messageBody:
Last night, we were hunting froogie foragers for the medalions so we can get keys for Sebilis. Looks like the spectral bow is the forager's common (like every time) drop. Another guild group let me loot one while I was waiting for my guys. Thanks Lords of Edelo! Magic, lore, no drop. Skill: archery. Atk Delay: 50. Damage: 19. Dex +3 Weight 8.5 Range 150. Class:War Rng Brd. Race: All. Now to find some arrows all/all.

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/me/mybowstats.jpg

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/me/mybow.jpg

Enjoy,

Sylly




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
